Values.name: Dense Kelp Tangle
Values.dialogue_text: The wavy field of <> is filled with razor sharp stalks as far as your scanners can detect.
Values.look_text: An undulating <> will be hard to navigate.
Values.hazard_damage_text: A tentacle surges from a <> and tears into your hull for {0} damage!

Values.name: Plasma Storm

Values.name: Flailing Kelp Tangle
Values.dialogue_text: A massive <> undulates wildly, whipping uncomfortably close to your ship.
Values.look_text: The <> writhes and wiggles in an erratic and unpredictable dance.
Values.hazard_damage_text: The <> whips your ship, denting your hull for {0} damage!

Values.name: Razor Kelp Blossoms
Values.dialogue_text: Floating petals from a nearby <> hang suspended both beautiful and deadly.
Values.look_text: Thousands of <> petals float in the area nearby, their serenety and beauty all but mask their deadly nature.
Values.hazard_damage_text: A deadly peal from the <> slices your hull for {0} damage!
